PortfolioItem.Title: AI-Powered Chatbot
PortfolioItem.Description: A sophisticated AI-powered chatbot capable of understanding and responding to natural language queries. Utilizes advanced machine learning algorithms for enhanced user interaction.

PortfolioItem.Title: Web Development Framework
PortfolioItem.Description: A modern web development framework that simplifies the process of building dynamic and responsive websites. Includes comprehensive documentation and examples.

PortfolioItem.Title: Mobile App for Task Management
PortfolioItem.Description: A user-friendly mobile application designed to help users manage their tasks efficiently. Features include task prioritization, reminders, and progress tracking.
